excerpt: "A councillor recognised in the King's Birthday Honours List has received her MBE from the Princess Royal. Heather Kidd, Shropshire Councillor for Chirbury and Worthen, was awarded the honour for her service to rural communities during a ceremony at Windsor Castle."
